channel.title: Karel the Robot on WY Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in Karel the Robot on WY Computer Science

item.title: Essentials
item.description: Book The book is Karel J Robot: A Gentle Introduction to the Art of Object-Oriented Programming in Java, by Joseph Bergin, Mark Stehlik, Jim Roberts, and Rich Pattis. We have the January 2008 printing, but all versions are very similar. Happily, the book is available for under $10 used. Documentation Karel the Robot documentation online. JUnit documentation online. Hamcrest matcher libary documentation online. Downloading the files You should get them all by git clone the central repository.
